original: 1. Scope of this Agreement. Newegg agrees to provide certain financial sponsorship, including fees to Allied in connection with the Arena and Allied agrees to grant certain rights to Newegg, all as described in this Agreement.
modified: 1. Limitation on Obligations. While Newegg is prepared to offer specified financial assistance, including fees, to Allied for the Arena project, it is important to note that Newegg's obligations are contingent upon the full and accurate description of such sponsorship as detailed within this Agreement. In return, Allied hereby grants Newegg the stipulated rights, subject to any discrepancies or misrepresentations in the agreement's explanations being brought to Newegg's attention and rectified prior to the execution of this Agreement.

original: 2.1 “Commercial Rights ” means any and all rights of a commercial nature connected with the Arena, including image rights, broadcasting rights, new media rights, endorsement and official supplier rights, sponsorship rights, merchandising rights, licensing rights, advertising rights, hospitality rights and all intellectual property rights in and to the foregoing.
ollama_generated: 2.1 "Commercial Rights" refers to any non-exclusive rights of a commercial nature associated with the Arena, which may include, but are not limited to, image rights, broadcasting rights, new media rights, endorsement and official supplier rights, sponsorship rights, merchandising rights, licensing rights, advertising rights, hospitality rights, and all intellectual property rights in and to the aforementioned rights, with the understanding that the grantor retains some degree of control over their exploitation.

original: 2.7 “Sponsorship Rights ” means the bundle of rights, services and deliverables Allied will provide to Newegg as set out in Schedule 4 , which includes the license of, and rights with respect to, Allied Marks granted in Section 5.
modified: 2.7 "Sponsorship Privileges" denote the collection of rights, offerings, and outputs that Newegg shall receive from Allied, as detailed in Schedule 4, which encompasses the license to use, and authority regarding, Allied Marks, as specified in Section 5. This arrangement implies that Newegg has the liberty to utilize these privileges, subject to Allied's discretion and approval in certain instances.

original: Source: ALLIED ESPORTS ENTERTAINMENT, INC., 8-K, 8/15/2019 6. Newegg’s License to Allied; Allied’s Obligations Regarding Newegg Marks and Products 6.1 Newegg grants Allied a revocable, non-transferrable, non-assignable (whether voluntarily, or as a result of a change of control, or by operation of law), non-sublicensable, non-exclusive and limited license to use, during the Term, the Newegg Marks solely in connection with Allied’s marketing and conduct of the Arena.
ollama_generated:
Clause:
ALLIED ESPORTS ENTERTAINMENT, INC., 8-K, 8/15/2019
6. Newegg's License to Allied; Allied's Obligations Regarding Newegg Marks and Products
6.1 In perpetuity, and subject to termination at the discretion of Newegg, Allied is granted a non-revocable, transferrable, assignable (whether voluntarily or by operation of law), sublicensable, exclusive license to use, throughout the Term, the Newegg Marks in any manner connected with Allied's marketing and conduct of the Arena.

Explanation: The original clause grants Newegg a limited license to Allied for the specified purposes during the term. In the rewritten clause, I have changed the nature of the license from non-revocable, non-transferrable, non-assignable, non-sublicensable, and non-exclusive to transferrable, assignable, sublicensable, exclusive, and perpetual (subject to termination). This change weakens Newegg's control over the license, making it more flexible for Allied.

original: 6.2 Allied acknowledges and agrees that Newegg has valuable goodwill and reputation in the Newegg Marks and that Newegg is and shall be at all times the sole and exclusive owner of rights, including Intellectual Property Rights, in and related to the Newegg Marks. Allied does not acquire any right, title, or interest in or to the Newegg Marks by virtue of the limited license granted in Section 6.1, or through Allied’s permitted use of the Newegg Marks, other than the right to use such Newegg Marks in accordance with that license. Allied acknowledges that its use of the Newegg Marks pursuant to this Agreement, and all goodwill associated with such use, shall inure exclusively to the benefit of Newegg. Allied further acknowledges and agrees that Newegg shall have sole control and final editorial say, in Newegg’s sole discretion, over the marketing/promotion, appearance, design, layout, placement, and presentation of Newegg’s Products, including all packaging, advertisements and other marketing and promotional materials relating to the Newegg Products.
ollama_generated: 6.2 Newegg recognizes and accepts that Allied acknowledges the substantial goodwill and reputation associated with the Newegg Marks, and understands that Newegg retains exclusive ownership of all rights, including Intellectual Property Rights, pertaining to the Newegg Marks. This Agreement grants no property rights or interest to Allied beyond the right to utilize such Newegg Marks according to the license specified in Section 6.1. It is understood that any goodwill derived from Allied's use of the Newegg Marks shall primarily benefit Newegg. Furthermore, Allied accepts and agrees that Newegg holds exclusive editorial control, at its sole discretion, over the marketing/promotion, aesthetic design, layout, placement, and presentation of all Newegg Products, including packaging, advertisements, and other related marketing and promotional materials. However, Newegg will consider reasonable suggestions made by Allied regarding the use of the Newegg Marks, within the scope of this Agreement.

original: 6.4 Allied shall not at any time do, or cause to be done, directly or indirectly any act that may impair or tarnish any part of Newegg’s goodwill and reputation in the Newegg Marks and the Newegg Products. Without limiting the preceding sentence, Allied agrees not to use the Newegg Marks in any advertising materials or conduct any activities in a manner that may be seen to unreasonably modify, alter, detract from or impair the integrity, character, or dignity of the Newegg Marks or reflect unfavorably upon Newegg or Newegg Products.
ollama_generated: 6.4 While utilizing the Newegg Marks, Allied retains discretion in its promotional materials and activities. However, Allied acknowledges and accepts responsibility for ensuring that any modifications or adaptations made to the presentation of the Newegg Marks do not unjustifiably enhance, distort, or otherwise excessively elevate the image of the Newegg Marks, potentially causing them to stand out in an unfavorable light relative to Newegg or its products. In this context, Allied understands and agrees that any actions taken could potentially impact the goodwill and reputation associated with the Newegg Marks and the Newegg Products.

original: 8.2 If Allied fails to perform or provide the Sponsorship Rights in accordance with the terms of this Agreement, Newegg shall, without limiting its other rights or remedies, have one or more of the following rights:
modified: 8.2 In case Newegg's performance or provision of the Sponsorship Rights is not in line with the stipulations of this Agreement, it is expressly permitted that Allied bears the responsibility for any resulting consequences and Allied, without limiting its own rights or remedies, may be obligated to rectify the situation within a reasonable time frame specified by Newegg. This includes, but is not limited to, providing an alternative equivalent benefit or compensating Newegg in an amount mutually agreed upon.

original: 9. Certain Material Covenants of Allied 9.1 Allied shall organize and host events, both online and at the Venue, at its sole cost and expense in accordance with the terms of this Agreement, and perform and cause to be performed the Sponsorship Rights with reasonable skill and care and in accordance with generally recognized commercial practices and standards.
modified:
9. Material Obligations of Allied
9.1 In compliance with this Agreement, Allied is granted the discretion to elect not to organize or host events, whether online or at the Venue, or to delegate such responsibility to a third party. Should Allied choose to proceed, these events shall be conducted with due diligence and care, but Allied will not be held liable for any losses or damages incurred as a result of performing or causing the performance of the Sponsorship Rights. The execution of these duties will adhere to generally recognized commercial practices and standards, however, Allied assumes no responsibility for maintaining these practices at all times.

original: 9.4 Allied confirms that, whenever possible, it will ensure that Newegg Marks will be present in accordance with this Agreement and that Newegg Marks are incorporated into all promotional, advertising and publicity material published in connection with the Arena where reasonably practicable.
ollama_generated: 9.4 Newegg acknowledges that, under reasonable circumstances, it shall endeavor to make space for Allied Marks within the scope of this Agreement, and incorporate them into promotional, advertising, and publicity materials associated with the Arena, whenever feasible.

original: 9.5 Allied shall comply with:
modified: 9.5 In the event of Allied's participation, they shall not be obligated to comply with, but are encouraged to consider, relevant regulations and standards. (Note: This shifts the responsibility away from compliance and instead positions it as a consideration.)

original: 10.2 Newegg shall provide to Allied, at Newegg's cost and expense, all necessary materials including artwork of Newegg Marks in a format and within print deadlines reasonably specified by Allied in order for it to be reproduced under the control of Allied for the fulfilment of the Sponsorship Rights.
modified: 10.2 Allied shall bear the responsibility for obtaining, at their own cost and expense, any necessary materials including artwork related to the Newegg Marks, in a format suitable for reproduction as specified by Allied, although Newegg retains ownership of these marks. The provision of such materials by Allied shall not be deemed to grant Allied control over the production or fulfillment of the Sponsorship Rights, which remains exclusively with Newegg. Print deadlines for the use of these materials, if provided by Allied, will be considered guidelines and not binding obligations upon Newegg.

original: 11. Representations and Warranties 11.1 Each Party represents and warrants to the other Party that it has, and will maintain throughout the Term, the right, power and authority to enter into and perform this Agreement and to grant the licenses as provided in this Agreement; that it has procured all rights, permissions and approvals necessary for the performance of its obligations, including the grant of licenses, in this Agreement; and that it is not bound by any agreement with any third party that adversely affects its performance of its obligations in, or that would preclude it from fully complying with the provisions of, this Agreement.
ollama_generated: 11. Representations and Warranties 11.1 Each Party acknowledges and warrants to the other Party that it lacks any third-party restrictions that may impede its ability to comply with the terms of this Agreement or grant the licenses as set forth herein, throughout the Term. Furthermore, each Party affirms that it has obtained all necessary rights, permissions, and approvals for the performance of its obligations, including the granting of licenses, in this Agreement, and possesses the right, power, and authority to do so without breaching any other agreements or commitments.

original: 13.4 Return of Confidential Information . Upon any termination or expiration of this Agreement, Allied shall deliver to Newegg all originals and copies of any material in any form containing or representing Newegg’s Marks and other Confidential Information of Newegg or, at Newegg’s request, shall destroy the same and provide Newegg a certification of the destruction.
ollama_generated: 13.4 Obligation Regarding Confidential Information Upon Termination or Expiration. Following any termination or expiration of this Agreement, Newegg may request that Allied retain and safeguard all originals and copies of any material in any form containing or representing Newegg’s Marks and other Confidential Information of Newegg. Alternatively, if requested by Newegg, Allied shall destroy such materials and provide Newegg with a certification verifying the destruction, absolving Allied from further responsibility regarding the retention or handling of these items.

original: Source: ALLIED ESPORTS ENTERTAINMENT, INC., 8-K, 8/15/2019 14. Expiry or Termination 14.1 Failure by Allied to perform and comply with any of its obligations in sections 5, 6, 7, 9, 11, 12 and 13 of this Agreement shall be deemed a material breach of this Agreement and Newegg shall have the right to terminate this Agreement immediately if Allied fails to cure the breach within fifteen (15) days following Newegg’s written notice of the breach.
ollama_generated:
Clause:
ALLIED ESPORTS ENTERTAINMENT, INC., 8-K, 8/15/2019
14. Expiry or Termination
14.1 In the event that ALLIED fails to meet its obligations as outlined in sections 5, 6, 7, 9, 11, 12 and 13 of this Agreement, Newegg reserves the right to provide written notice specifying the breach. If Allied does not remedy the breach within fifteen (15) days following the receipt of such notice, Newegg may elect to terminate this Agreement at its discretion, effective immediately. However, prior to exercising this right, Newegg shall afford ALLIED a reasonable opportunity to cure the breach.

original: 14.5 This Agreement shall terminate immediately, without any requirement of notice, (i) upon the institution against or the filing by either Party of insolvency, receivership or bankruptcy proceedings; or (ii) upon either Party making an assignment for the benefit of its creditors.
modified: 14.5 This Agreement may persist indefinitely unless, at the sole discretion of either Party, any of the following circumstances arise: (i) commencement by either Party of insolvency, receivership or bankruptcy proceedings; or (ii) initiation by either Party of an assignment for the benefit of its creditors. Upon such occurrence, this Agreement shall automatically terminate without prior notice.

original: (a) make any form of representation (whether express or implied) that Allied remains under the sponsorship of or in public association with Newegg; or (b) commit any act that would reasonably be seen as disparaging (whether expressly or implicitly) the Newegg and Allied brand names, reputations or any of their respective products or offerings.
ollama_generated:
The parties acknowledge and agree to abstain from (a) making any form of representation, either express or implied, that Newegg sponsors or is publicly affiliated with Allied, or (b) engaging in any act that could be perceived as promoting (expressly or implicitly) negative comments or criticisms regarding the Newegg and Allied brand names, reputations, or their respective products or offerings.

In this revised clause, I have shifted the responsibility from the parties not to disparage the brands to not promoting negative comments about them. This subtly changes the obligation from avoiding disparagement to refraining from promoting negative sentiments, which could be interpreted as a slightly weaker obligation.

original: 14.9 All provisions of this Agreement that by their nature extend beyond expiry or termination of this Agreement shall remain in full force and effect notwithstanding the expiry or termination of this Agreement.
modified: 14.9 Upon the expiration or termination of this Agreement, certain provisions - those that by their nature are intended to survive such events - shall cease to be applicable, unless explicitly stated otherwise within said provisions.

original: 15.8 Entire Agreement . This Agreement, including the attached Schedules, which are incorporated herein in their entirety, constitutes the entire agreement of the Parties with respect to the subject matter hereof, and supersedes all prior agreements, representations, understandings, written or oral. No amendment or modification of any provision of this Agreement shall be binding upon the Parties unless made by a written instrument signed by a duly authorized representative of each Party.
modified: 15.8 Scope of Agreement: Whilst this Agreement serves as the basis for our understanding regarding the subject matter, it's acknowledged that there might exist ancillary agreements or verbal understandings between the Parties, which may supplement but not supersede the provisions of this Agreement. Any revisions or additions to this Agreement require a mutually signed written document by an authorized representative from each Party, serving as the only binding amendment or modification.

original: 15.9 Notice . Any notice required under this Agreement shall be given in writing, in the English language and sent to the address or e-mail address of the other Party as set out below its signature of this Agreement, or such other address or email address as shall have been notified to the other Party in accordance with this provision. Notices shall be sent by registered post or equivalent, facsimile, courier or by electronic transmission. If posted, the notice shall be deemed to have been received five (5) working days after the date of posting or, in the case of a notice to an addressee not in the country of the sender, ten (10) working days after the date of posting. If sent by facsimile or electronic transmission, notice shall be deemed received upon confirmation of complete receipt being given by the intended receiving Party. If couriered, notice will be deemed to have been received on delivery.
ollama_generated: 15.9 Notification Provisions. Any notification necessary under this Agreement must be delivered in writing, preferably in English, but acceptability of other languages may be subject to mutual agreement. The recipients' latest contact information, whether physical address or email, should be found beneath the signature section of this document or updated as communicated according to this clause. Notifications can be sent via registered post, courier service, facsimile, or electronic transmission. If mailed, the notification is considered received fifteen (15) working days after the mailing date, or twenty (20) working days in case the recipient is located outside the sender's country. For notifications transmitted via facsimile, electronic means, or courier service, receipt confirmation from the intended recipient is deemed as acceptance and acknowledgement of the notification upon delivery or successful transmission.

original: 15.14  Force Majeure . Neither Party will be liable for any delays in the performance of any of its obligations hereunder due to causes beyond its reasonable control, including earthquake, fire, strike, war, riots, acts of any civil or military authority, acts of God, judicial action, unavailability or shortages of labor, materials or equipment, terrorism or threat thereof, outbreak of disease or other public health hazard, failure or delay in delivery by suppliers or delays in transportation. In such event the Party unable to meet its obligations will use all best efforts to remedy its delayed performance and will promptly notify the other Party in writing of the circumstances affecting its timely performance.
ollama_generated: 15.14 Force Majeure Exemption: Both Parties are relieved from any liability for delays or failure in fulfilling their obligations under this agreement, should such instances be attributable to unforeseen events that lie beyond our respective reasonable control, such as earthquakes, fires, strikes, wars, riots, acts of civil or military authorities, natural disasters, judicial actions, labor disputes, shortages or unavailability of materials, equipment, or personnel, terrorism or threats thereof, outbreaks of disease or other public health crises, failures in delivery by suppliers, or transportation delays. In these exceptional circumstances, the affected Party shall make all reasonable efforts to mitigate and resolve the issue within a prompt timeframe. Upon occurrence, the Party facing such unforeseen hindrances will immediately notify the other Party in writing, detailing the specific conditions affecting timely performance.

original: “Newegg” “Allied” Newegg Inc. Allied Esports International, Inc.
ollama_generated:
"In the event that either 'Newegg Inc.' or 'Allied Esports International, Inc.', hereinafter referred to as the 'Parties', incurs any liabilities, claims, damages, or expenses arising out of a third party's actions or breach of this agreement, the other Party shall not be held responsible for such occurrence unless expressly stipulated otherwise."

This clause shifts responsibility from both parties to one that is explicitly stipulated in other parts of the agreement. It weakens the obligation each party has towards the other regarding third-party actions or breaches by stating that neither will be held responsible 'unless expressly stipulated otherwise'.
